bptree

Class BPlusTree<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bptree.BPlusTree<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of keys
    V - the type of values

    public class BPlusTree<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    The BPlusTree class implements B+-trees. Each BPlusTree stores its elements in the main memory (not on disks) for simplicity.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
